name: Diamond Trust of London
blurb: A turn-based strategy game for two players about spying, bribing, and loyalty.  A boxed-copy cartridge release for the Nintendo DS.

rewards.reward: A physical photocopy of the redacted company memo from the Diamond Trust of London archives (mailed worldwide).
A boxed copy of Diamond Trust of London, regular edition.  (Free USA shipping.  Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)

A boxed copy of Diamond Trust of London, regular edition, plus a physical photocopy of a redacted company memo from the Diamond Trust of London archives.  Several different memos will be produced---which one will you get?  (Free USA shipping. Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)

A boxed copy of Diamond Trust of London, regular edition;  plus a digital download of the Kickstarter-exclusive Soundtrack Anthology album of demos, remixes, and outtakes;  plus a physical photocopy of a redacted company memo from the Diamond Trust of London archives. Several different memos will be produced---which one will you get? (Free USA shipping. Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)

A limited edition boxed copy of Diamond Trust of London.  Only 1000 of these will be available, ever, and this is the main route to get one.  Signed and numbered.  Special inclusions inside the package.  (Free USA shipping.  Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)
Two boxed copies of the regular edition.  (Free USA shipping.  Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)

Two boxed copies of the regular edition, plus two digital downloads of the Kickstarter-exclusive Soundtrack Anthology album, plus two different physical photocopies of redacted company memos from the Diamond Trust of London archives.  (Free USA shipping. Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)
One boxed copy of the limited edition plus one boxed copy of the regular edition.  (Free USA shipping.  Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)
Two boxed copies of the limited edition.  (Free USA shipping.  Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)
Two boxed copies of the limited edition. (Free USA shipping. Add $13 to your pledge for international shipping.)
Special funding credit in the manual, PLUS two boxed copies of the limited edition, AND one of your copies will have a low sequence number (in the range #10 to #34).  (Free shipping worldwide.)

A hand-crafted Diamond Trust of London archive box containing a collection of artifacts that is even more f************g than what is in the limited edition, PLUS special funding credit in the manual, PLUS two boxed copies of the limited edition, AND one of your copies will have a lower sequence number (in the range #6 to #9).  (Free shipping worldwide.)

A custom, hand-altered USB flash drive containing 221 separate WAV sound files that fuel the music engine (make your own remix) and 119 separate PNG image files that comprise the sprites, fonts, and other graphics---see how Diamond Trust works on the inside;  PLUS a hand-crafted Diamond Trust of London archive box containing a collection of artifacts that is even more f************g than what is in the limited edition, PLUS special funding credit on the back of the box, PLUS two boxed copies of the limited edition, AND one of your copies will have an ending sequence number (in the range #1000 to #997).  (Free shipping worldwide.)

A hand-crafted Diamond Trust of London mega archive box containing a huge collection of artifacts that is yet even more f************g than what is in the previous rewards, PLUS a hand-altered USB flash drive containing source sound and image files (see previous reward), PLUS special funding credit on the back of the box, PLUS two boxed copies of the limited edition, AND one of your copies will have a super-low sequence number (in the range #2 to #5).  AND all of it HAND DELIVERED to you in your town anywhere in the world by masterminds Jason Rohrer and Tom Bailey.  You will get an anonymous letter telling you to go to a particular pay phone at a particular time and await further instructions...
